mapper.select: SELECT RNUM, NOTICE_CODE, NOTICE_DATE, NOTICE_TITLE, ADMIN_ID, HITCOUNT FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, NOTICE_CODE, TO_CHAR(NOTICE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') NOTICE_DATE, NOTICE_TITLE, ADMIN_ID, HITCOUNT FROM ( SELECT NOTICE_CODE, NOTICE_DATE, NOTICE_TITLE, ADMIN_CODE ADMIN_ID, HITCOUNT FROM TBL_NOTICE ORDER BY NOTICE_DATE ) ) WHERE RNUM >= #{start} AND RNUM <= #{end} ORDER BY RNUM DESC

SELECT N.NOTICE_CODE NOTICE_CODE, N.NOTICE_DATE NOTICE_DATE, N.NOTICE_TITLE NOTICE_TITLE , A.ADMIN_ID ADMIN_ID, N.HITCOUNT HITCOUNT, N.NOTICE_CONTENT NOTICE_CONTENT FROM TBL_NOTICE N JOIN TBL_ADMIN A ON N.ADMIN_CODE = A.ADMIN_CODE WHERE N.NOTICE_CODE = #{notice_code}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_NOTICE(NOTICE_CODE, NOTICE_DATE, NOTICE_TITLE, NOTICE_CONTENT, ADMIN_CODE, HITCOUNT) VALUES('NT'||NOTICE_SEQ.NEXTVAL, SYSDATE, #{notice_title}, #{notice_content}, #{admin_id}, 0)
